CustomField.formula: CASE( copado__Status__c, "Completed Successfully", "/resource/" + IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') + "SetupDashboardIcons/PipelineSvgIcons/pipeline-check.png", "In progress", "/img/loading.gif", "Completed with Errors", "/resource/" + IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') + "SetupDashboardIcons/PipelineSvgIcons/pipeline-cross.png", "/resource/" + IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') + "SetupDashboardIcons/PipelineSvgIcons/pipeline-paused.png")
CustomField.label: Flag Status
